llm_output.rationale: The table provides some dimensional requirements for R-6 Rural Residential, including a minimum living area per dwelling of 750 sq ft. However, this is footnoted with [3], which states 'Minimum living area per dwelling (sf) does not apply to any structure subject to regulation under the NC Residential Code for one and two-family dwellings'. Therefore, this value may not apply to single-family homes in R-6.
